summary.span: 基本设计器类，用于扩展根设计文档中支持嵌套组件的设计模式行为。

span.span: Base designer class for extending the design mode behavior of a root design document that supports nested components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为支持嵌套组件的根设计文档的设计器提供基类。 provides a base class for designers of root design documents that support nested components. 除了从 类继承的方法和功能外， 还实现了 接口，为关联的组件和任何嵌套的组件提供根级别设计模式视图。In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the class, implements the interface to provide a root-level design mode view for the associated component, and any nested components. > [!NOTE] > 或 的根级别设计模式视图通常由内置根设计器提供。The root-level design mode view for a or is typically provided by a built-in root designer. 若要在设计模式下提供其他类型的根组件的视图，需要自定义 实现。A custom implementation is required to provide a view for other types of root components in design mode. 您可以使用 将设计器与类型相关联。You can associate a designer with a type using a . 有关自定义设计时行为的概述，请参阅[扩展设计时支持](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/37899azc(v=vs.100))。For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/37899azc(v=vs.100)).

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果为 ，则托管及非托管资源都释放；如果为 ，则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源，并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 如果 `disposing` 参数为 true，则此方法将释放此 引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

Protected Overridable Function GetToolSupported (tool As ToolboxItem) As Boolean
abstract member GetToolSupported : System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem -> bool override this.GetToolSupported : System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem -> bool

param.name: tool
param.span: 要对其进行工具箱支持测试的 。

span.span: The to test for toolbox support.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示设计器是否支持指定工具。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the specified tool is supported by the designer.

returns.span: 如果应在工具箱上启用该工具，则为 ；如果文档设计器不知道如何使用该工具，则为 。

span.span: if the tool should be enabled on the toolbox; if the document designer doesn't know how to use the tool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果支持某一工具，则当设计器重新获得焦点时，它将在 "工具箱" 中启用。If a tool is supported, it will be enabled in the toolbox when the designer regains focus. 否则，将禁用该功能。Otherwise, it will be disabled. 将工具标记为启用或禁用后，就不能再对其进行查询。Once a tool is marked as enabled or disabled it cannot be queried again.

span.span: Initializes the designer with the specified component.

span.span: The designer can access the component's site and request services from it in this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 接口方法重写仅在设计时将名为 "TrayLargeIcon" 的不能浏览的 `boolean` 属性添加到此设计器的组件。This interface method override adds a non-browsable, design-time only `boolean` property named "TrayLargeIcon" to this designer's component at design time. 组件栏使用此属性。This property is used by the component tray.
